room_title: Escape room "Nightmare in The Gardens" by The Escape South Florida in West Palm Beach
room_address: 10800 N. Military Trail Suite 211 Palm Beach Gardens, FL 33410
room_description:
A serial killer has captured you, tied you up and blacked out your sight as he threw you into his cold and barren basement. Left to fend for yourself, you realize things can’t be good. The smell of blood lingers in the dusty air around you.
He has spent years creating this sick and twisted room to torture people like you. You must find your way out and escape, but it won’t be as easy as you think! This psychopath will try to trick you and just when you think you can escape, you realize he’s one step ahead of you. Use each other to outsmart him and escape before he decides to make you his next victim.
